div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 601 Sebesu de Sus (formerly Felsö-Sebes), (935) c. 24 km. SE of Sibiu, Rumania, 1835 ? Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 469 AR. Pot hoard Dyrrhachium: dr. Disposition: Vienna 58 Ackner, AVSL 4 (1851), pp. 21-2 Seidl, AfÖG 9 (1853), p. 165 Mitrea, ED 10 (1945), p. 89, no. 21
